subscription.title: Sign up for emails and get a nice discount 10%

cookies.text: We need your consent to use individual cookies so that we can, among other things, show you information relating to your interests. Read more information <link>here</link>.

cookieSettingsModal.mainDescription: We use cookies to ensure a seamless browsing experience and to enhance the functionality, performance, and usability of the website through traffic analysis.
cookieSettingsModal.description1: These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of the website.
cookieSettingsModal.description2: They help us understand how you use the site and continuously improve it based on this data.
cookieSettingsModal.description3: These cookies allow us to display relevant content and personalized offers that may be of interest to you.
